name: Mining Fever
description:
Deep mines and dungeons full of treasure await for you to be conquered! Equip your trusty pickaxe and venture into the depths in search for wealth and glory.

But beware! There are many things down there that will do anything to stop you from achieving your goals. Be ready to stand and fight. Only when you emerge victorious, will you be able to take the spoils of war up top and use them to enhance your equipment.

Features:
- Explore multiple mines
- Upgrade your equipment to get more deadly and effective
- Fight and defeat imposing bosses
- Use a friendly, easy to use control scheme
- Discover new content and surprises in many upcoming updates

Adventure in the deep awaits you! Only you can become a true mining hero and gather treasures beyond your wildest imagination. Immeasurable wealth awaits for you only to take it. Don’t hesitate for a minute longer and get ready for an adventure of your life!

Further content updates are coming to the game soon, so you can be certain that the fun will not end quickly!
